div.div:
Notes
1. Includes the initialization of the SPI bus, TFT LCD display, buzzer PWM channel, and hardware timer.
2. Among other state variables, updates whether the game is over or not.
3. NimBLE operates on an RTOS, managing the BLE stack independently.

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
